parameters: \n<Original Lily>\c[5]Hey, I thought I told you to wait in the van.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Look... You're not going to like seeing this. Go back to the van.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Sure kiddo. You deserve it as much as me.
You pour the kerosene all over the base of the house.
Both of you drench the garden, giving its residents one last drink.
You send some down for Papa to deal with.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Once we throw the lighter, there's no going back.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]I soaked the azoth hair in the garden with the tanks from the shed.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]If the alchemists still have it growing around the campus, it should light it up like a fireball.
Despite the rain, the house bursts into violent flames.
...There is no more house to wake up in.
The heat is intense even from a distance.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]It's okay to still love him.
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]I... I still don't know why he hurt me...
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]No matter what... He said I was a bad girl...
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Lily, you didn't deserve anything he did to you.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Just because someone's your papa, it doesn't mean they're right.
You feel tears that don't belong to you begin to fall.
The hug tightens on both ends.
Lily needed this hug for a long time.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Hey, I thought I told you to wait in the van.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Look... You're not going to like seeing this. Go back to the van.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Sure kiddo. You deserve it as much as me.
You pour the kerosene all over the base of the house.
Both of you drench the garden, giving its residents one last drink.
You send some down for Papa to deal with.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Once we throw the lighter, there's no going back.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]I soaked the azoth hair in the garden with the tanks from the shed.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]If the alchemists still have it growing around the campus, it should light it up like a fireball.
Despite the rain, the house bursts into violent flames.
...There is no more house to wake up in.
The heat is intense even from a distance.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]It's okay to still love him.
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]I... I still don't know why he hurt me...
\n<Lily Version \v[10]>\c[5]No matter what... He said I was a bad girl...
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Lily, you didn't deserve anything he did to you.
\n<Original Lily>\c[5]Just because someone's your papa, it doesn't mean they're right.
You feel tears that don't belong to you begin to fall.
The hug tightens on both ends.
Lily needed this hug for a long time.
The creature bites into you, ripping muscle from bone.
Your screams are heard by nobody, but the creature finally feels full.
You sure threw out a lot of things.
Why were you gathering all this stuff again?
Oh well, there's still room in the can.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Uh... dude? Something weird's happening.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]She's literally putting everything in the trash.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Like, there shouldn't be that much room, right?
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Let me check the notes.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]I seriously can't figure out why she's doing this.
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Okay, it looks like she threw out literally everything she could use as rope.
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]But now she's associating putting rope in the trash like putting it in the well.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Okay, but why the plunger and all that other crap?
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]I think she's just stuck in a loop since there's no goal now?
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Does that mean this run was a success?
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Nah, she still got dressed and left the house.
\n<Blue Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Also she's kind of like a reverse hoarder.
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Oh shit, she got the weed whacker.
\n<Papa>\c[1]I'm going to fix it myself! It doesn't need to be thrown out, I can fix it!
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]The one covered in rust?
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Oh, that's what that button is?
\n<Papa>\c[1]I'm not going to let you throw out perfectly good equipment you piece of shit!
\n<Gray Cloaked Figure>\c[2]Hey what the fuck was that\^                 .
